targets.query: SELECT mean("cpu_total") AS "Total CPU's", mean("cpu_allocated") AS "Allocated", mean("cpu_other") AS "Other", mean("cpu_idle") AS "Idle" FROM "sinfo_cpus" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostname" fill(null)

SELECT mean("cpu_total") AS "Total CPU's", mean("cpu_allocated") AS "Allocated", mean("cpu_other") AS "Other", mean("cpu_idle") AS "Idle" FROM "sinfo_cpus" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostname" fill(null)
